items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The user did not specify a trust setting.

items.name: case proceed
items.desc: The user granted permission to trust the certificate for the purposes designated in the specified policies.

items.name: case deny
items.desc: The user specified that the certificate should not be trusted.

items.name: case recoverableTrustFailure
items.desc: Trust is denied, but recovery may be possible.

items.name: case fatalTrustFailure
items.desc: Trust is denied and no simple fix is available.

items.name: case otherError
items.desc: A value that indicates a failure other than trust evaluation.

items.name: case invalid
items.desc: An indication of an invalid setting or result.
